values: The Surpassing Excellency of God in the Joy of His Suffering PeopleThe Surpassing Excellency of God in the Joy of His Suffering People

Suffering is the normal means God appoints to spread the gospel through his people. We can only full embrace Jesus when we rejoice in our sufferings.
